generated_body: In the article titled "Treasury yields tick higher amid uncertainty over US-China trade deal," the user is likely to find an analysis of the recent movements in U.S. Treasury yields, which may reflect broader economic sentiments amid ongoing trade negotiations between the U.S. and China.
